content: The Tiger Vanguard is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the center of the Crouching Tiger Temple, this fearsome Tiger Guai is one of the hardest bosses to overcome in all of Chapter 2.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Vanguard is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the center of the Crouching Tiger Temple, this fearsome Tiger Guai is one of the hardest bosses to overcome in all of Chapter 2.
